references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Physics-informed machine learning (PINN), a core methodology used in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Physics-informed neural networks: a deep learning framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), which are central to the experimental evaluation of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Tackling the Curse of Dimensionality with Physics-Informed Neural Networks
references.reason: This paper presents Stochastic Dimension Gradient Descent (SDGD), a baseline method compared against in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Hutchinson Trace Estimation for High-Dimensional and High-Order Physics-Informed Neural Networks
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it directly addresses the challenges of high dimensionality and high-order derivatives in PINNs, a key focus of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Taylor-mode automatic differentiation for higher-order derivatives in JAX
references.reason: This paper introduces Taylor mode automatic differentiation, a crucial technique used in the proposed method of the target paper.
